instructions.step: Get the water hot enough to dissolve the honey. PDT is about 140°F and you can drink it right away.
Combine all ingredients and stir until the honey is dissolved.
Serve _immediately_ to your sick family member, maybe with some of Gortimer's Graham Cracker Sandwiches?
